name: number-allocator
description: A library for the unique number allocator

scripts.ci: npm run tslint && npm run typescript-compile-test && npm run test && codecov
scripts.browser-build: rimraf dist/ && mkdirp dist/ && browserify number-allocator.js --standalone number-allocator > dist/number-allocator.js && uglifyjs dist/number-allocator.js --compress --mangle --output dist/number-allocator.min.js

author: Takatoshi Kondo
